snippet.title: Dreamside Maroon | DigiPen Institute of Technology
snippet.description:
http://www.DigiPen.edu | DigiPen Institute of Technology

Dreamside Maroon is a 3D exploration game that lets you ride a growing vine up to the moon. Light torches, collect fireflies, and take in the amazing sights as you experience the game's freedom of movement and travel.

Download the game for free at:
https://www.digipen.edu/?id=1170&proj=8715

DigiPen Institute of Technology offers bachelor's and master's degree programs in computer science, computer engineering, game design, digital art and animation, and music and sound design.
